Text.Page:
Mission Orders

We need to take out some of the lesser argons near the {@Rgn:45002$$Tower Approach} in {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold}.

Kill {@LinkCreature:45#1001#kelba chargers}, {@LinkCreature:45#1002#argonomorph dwarf orcans}, and {@LinkCreature:45#1003#argonomorph runekeepers}.

Report to Laetesha at Pathfinder Post when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
